last_episode_to_air.name: The Mystery
last_episode_to_air.overview: Aditya peddles drugs in jail, but that doesn't go well with Layak. Raghu produces a search warrant against the new suspect. Pushed into a corner, Aditya plans his final revenge.

name: Criminal Justice
overview: Sex, drugs and a gruesome murder. An edgy one night stand turns into a nightmare for Aditya, when he wakes up with blood on his hands. The evidence is stacked against him, but he doesn't remember the grisly crime. Is he guilty or not ?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Sex, drugs and a gruesome murder. An edgy one night stand turns into a nightmare for Aditya, when he wakes up with blood on his hands. The evidence is stacked against him, but he doesn't remember the grisly crime. Is he guilty or not ?

episodes.name: Once Upon a Night
episodes.overview: Driving his family's cab for one night, Aditya picks up a young woman, Sanaya, and ends up spending the evening with her. After a night of sex and drugs, he wakes up to find her stabbed to death but has no recollection of what happened.

episodes.name: Under Arrest
episodes.overview: By the end of the night, Aditya is in police custody. Madhav, a small-time advocate bargains to represent him, but fails. To his surprise, Mandira, a big fish in the game takes up Aditya's case pro bono.

episodes.name: The Price of Life
episodes.overview: Mandira grapples with Aditya's amnesia related to the fateful night, whereas, Madhav finds a new lead in his investigation. Meanwhile, in jail, Mustafa makes an unexpected demand from Aditya.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Mustafa takes Aditya under his wing and gives him an unusual welcome gift. At the trial, Madhav realises that a mountain of evidence is stacked against Aditya.

episodes.name: Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: The tension between Mustafa and Layak heats up. Meanwhile, Aditya weighs the pros and cons of pleading guilty as Jimmy D'Souza makes a shocking revelation in court.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: While Aditya takes on a daunting task to appease Mustafa, Nikhat risks her career to free him. Will she prove his innocence?

episodes.name: A New Bond
episodes.overview: Aditya’s bond with Mustafa deepens but his family begins to crumble. Meanwhile, Madhav finds a dangerous lead, giving the case a new direction.

episodes.name: The Going Gets Tough
episodes.overview: With the entry of a new rival, Aditya and Mustafa end up in solitary confinement. Meanwhile, Madhav and Nikhat find a previously unnoticed clue.

episodes.name: A New Kingpin
episodes.overview: A brutal fight sends Aditya to the hospital, where he meets Mustafa. Raghu helps Madhav and Nikhat, and together they open a new can of worms.

episodes.name: The Mystery
episodes.overview: Aditya peddles drugs in jail, but that doesn't go well with Layak. Raghu produces a search warrant against the new suspect. Pushed into a corner, Aditya plans his final revenge.

1.name: Season 1
